channel.title: Help with shops
channel.description:
this is probably a amature mistake on my part
i added a npc for the shop then added the shop now theres the same npc with another shop and my shop went to the wrong npc and when ever i talk to or trade the npc i made i get a DC or nothing at all happens

item.dc:creator: @antcolony3 antcolony3

@antcolony3 wrote:

so u want me to give u a personal tut on how to make a shop???
i can if u want
done it many timz
